info.title: Strings Translation API
info.description: This API provides on-demand text translation.

post.summary: Translates text from one language to another.

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing API key

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Error processing the translation

x-codeSamples.source:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://platform.strings.dev/api/translate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"context\":\"Do you have any safety concerns?\",\"text\":\"No hay suficientes cascos para la tripulación.\",\"targetLanguage\":\"en\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("x-api-key", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://platform.strings.dev/api/translate")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("x-api-key", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .body("{\"context\":\"Do you have any safety concerns?\",\"text\":\"No hay suficientes cascos para la tripulación.\",\"targetLanguage\":\"en\"}")
  .asString();

  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",

  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",

    "content-type: application/json",
    "x-api-key: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("platform.strings.dev")

payload = "{\"context\":\"Do you have any safety concerns?\",\"text\":\"No hay suficientes cascos para la tripulación.\",\"targetLanguage\":\"en\"}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'x-api-key': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/api/translate", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://platform.strings.dev/api/translate")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-api-key"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request.body = "{\"context\":\"Do you have any safety concerns?\",\"text\":\"No hay suficientes cascos para la tripulación.\",\"targetLanguage\":\"en\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body
